ygData.subject: Re: Cash
ygData.msgSnippet: Depending on your charisma, wisdom, and intelligence, it can take anywhere from 70pp to 200pp to get to skill 90.  I smithed with my high elf wizard at 80 CHR,
ygData.messageBody:
Depending on your charisma, wisdom, and intelligence, it can take anywhere
from 70pp to 200pp to get to skill 90. I smithed with my high elf wizard at
80 CHR, 98 WIS, and 146 INT. Hope this helps.

Trenfen of Fennin Ro
